ofx:section.ofx:title: Questions

l:item.ofx:paragraph: The position describes the position of this question in the section.
The code is a optional reference to uniquely identify the question.
The question defines the question itself.
The remark can contain further explainations of the question.

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The following check-boxes control the way how questions can be answered.

l:item.ofx:paragraph: Calculate Score indicates that this question is included in the automatic score calculation for the section.
The fields Min Score and Max Score define the lower and upper bounds of scores which can be entered by the user.
If Score is checked, the user is allowed to enter a score.
If Yes/No answers are allowed this box has to be checked.
With Natural Number (e.g. 1, 2, 3, ...) or Number (any number like 3,14159) the administrator can define what kind of number can be entered in the answer.
Remark allows additional remarks on the answer.

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: It is possible to combine any of these fields, e.g. allow the user to enter a score, a free-text field and a remark while the section score is automatically computed.
